item.title: Targus introduces the T-1211 line of laptop and tablet cases
item.description:
Targus, a company known for its laptop cases and accessories, has introduced the T-1211 collection, a new line of laptop and tablet cases designed for both work and everyday commutes. The T-1211 cases have a sleek, minimalist design accented by a subtle crosshatch pattern. Every case in the collection features a water-resistant exterior and a scratch-resistant interior lining. The T-1211 13.3”-17” Backpack offers a spacious yet streamlined design with multiple compartments for organization...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/targus-introduces-the-t-1211-line-of-laptop-and-tablet-cases/

item.title: Beogram 4000: Replacement of Wiring Sleeve of Carriage Harness
item.description:
A Beogram 4000 turntable, previously restored in 2020, was brought in for repairs due to an oscillating solenoid issue. However, upon inspection, a more critical problem was discovered: the wiring harness sleeve was severely damaged, exposing the wires. This level of damage had never been encountered before. Thankfully, the wires themselves were still intact. The timing of the solenoid problem was fortunate, as further use could have led to wire damage...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-replacement-of-wiring-sleeve-of-carriage-harness/
